description: This file defines interface APIs for a data model library related to the Cisco SPVTG component. It declares functions to retrieve various parameter values (boolean, integer, unsigned long, string) associated with the 'com.cisco.spvtg.ccsp.pam' object in the data model.

methods.name: Pam_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for the object, given the handle and parameter name.

methods.name: Pam_GetParamIntValue
methods.description: Retrieves an integer parameter value for the object, given the handle and parameter name.

methods.name: Pam_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value for the object, given the handle and parameter name.

methods.name: Pam_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value for the object, given the handle and parameter name, with size management.
